sections.heading: OF PREDIAL SERVITUDESArt. 751. Destruction of dominant or of servient estate
sections.text: A predial servitude is extinguished by the permanent and total destruction of the dominant estate or of the part of the servient estate burdened with the servitude.Acts 1977, No. 514, ยง1.
